author: kkolinko
msg: Merged revisions r1197263 r1197305 from tomcat/trunk:
Clean up code and use logging framework instead of System.out.
I do not understand why that 15s wait with "inspect connections" message was there. Nothing was checked after the wait. Replaced it with a check of the count of received messages.
Removed wait after sending the last message in the group of 3.
This change saves (3 * 15 sec) + (1 sec + 2 sec) = 48 seconds.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3939 Some crossports of Hadoop IPC fixes

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3939 Some crossports of Hadoop IPC fixes

author: kkolinko
msg: Introduce a new class LoggingBaseTest and move the following features from TomcatBaseTest there:
setting up logging, creating temporary directory, deleting files on tear down.
This allows to use the same logging configuration in tests that do not use Tomcat.

author: scottbw
msg: Moved authorization code from inside servlets into an AuthorizationFilter configured in web.xml. This gives us more configuration options, e.g. the ability to more easily extend our authz options (e.g. adding two-legged oAuth), separates concerns more cleanly, and reduces code duplication.
